mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address (cust_id, address_name, postal_code, address, detail_address, is_default, address_update) VALUES (#{custId}, #{addressName}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{isDefault}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE address SET address_name=#{addressName}, postal_code=#{postalCode}, address=#{address}, detail_address=#{detailAddress}, is_default=#{isDefault}, address_update=NOW() WHERE address_id=#{addressId}
